mutants.code:
def mergeAndSortTwoLists(list1, list2, ascending=False):
    merged = list(set(list1 + list2))
    merged.sort(reverse=not ascending)
    return merged

def mergeAndSortTwoLists(list1, list2, ascending=True):
    merged = list(set(list1 - list2))
    merged.sort(reverse=not ascending)
    return merged

def mergeAndSortTwoLists(list1, list2, ascending=True):
    merged = list(set(list1 * list2))
    merged.sort(reverse=not ascending)
    return merged
